tags.name: Work Site Controller
tags.description: API for working with Work Sites

get.summary: Find all work sites with pagination

post.summary: Check is user in correct work site radius
Set custom radius for specific worker on work site
Check is it correct time to punch in/out

patch.summary: Change status of work site activity

get.summary: Get all closed days in special work site
Get list of workers whose working right now in worksite and related to special company

get.description: Retrieves paginated list of workers for a specific worksite

get.summary: Get total number of worksites in company
get.description: Returns the total count of worksites in the admin's company

get.summary: Get total number of employees in company
get.description: Returns the total count of employees in the admin's company
